input_text.Prompt:
Using the item specifications and item specification, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item specification:
G.I. JOE Real American Hero car bumper sticker 8" x 2"

Item specifications:
Size: 8" x 2"
Long-Lasting, All-Weather Outdoor Grade Vinyl, UV and Water Resistant
Apply to Any Surface - car bumper, window, locker, binder, wall, wood, metal, etc.
Apply to dry and clean surfaces.
Die cut around the image
Easy Application - Peel & Stick, Removable & Reusable

Product description

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
Attention-Grabbing: What better way to show off your love for the G.I. JOE Real American Hero than with this awesome car bumper sticker?

Interest-Building: Great for all fans, collectors and enthusiasts of G.I. JOE, this bumper sticker will turn heads wherever you go!

Desire-Creating: The perfect gift for yourself or your fellow G.I. JOE fans, this bumper sticker is sure to be a hit!

Action-Oriented: Don't delay, get your bumper sticker today and show the world your love for G.I. JOE Real American Hero!
input_text.Response B:
Attention: The G.I. JOE Real American Hero car bumper sticker is a fantastic product to help you communicate your love of America, patriotism, and military service. 

Interest: The bumper sticker is made from long-lasting, all-weather outdoor grade vinyl and can be applied to any surface, making it extremely versatile and durable. The UV and water resistance make it perfect for outdoor use, and it can be easily removed and reused as needed. 

Desire: Whether you're showing your support for the military, displaying your love of country, or just making a statement, the G.I. JOE Real American Hero car bumper sticker is a great way to do so. 

Action: Order your G.I. JOE Real American Hero car bumper sticker today!

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
